评论详情: I bought this to replace  a similar style I had worn out. This lived up to the good reviews. It's soft and warm. It washes nicely and does not wrinkle. It's casual, but could be dressed up with jewelry. Very comfortable. Seems like it will last a good while. It has some stretch, but it fits perfectly. I am 165lb  5ft 1 and got a large. It's perfect. Not too long, but covers the butt and hangs nicely. And the sleeves are just right..i always push them up a little anyway.I just ordered another color! Definitely going to be my go-to top for fall and winter!

Again, this looks so nice on the website.  For the price it is not worth it at all.  The sleeves were two inches past the end of my hand.  It was made for the Jolly Green Giant.  I don't understand who they produce these for.  The arm length is ridiculous.  Just looking at it I knew it was not right.  I am about to give up ordering clothes.  Whoever makes this clothes needs help with measurements.
It's very nice.  However it runs bigger than usual Amazon sizing.

This sweater is a vibrant red & I get compliments whenever I wear it.  Fit is true to size.

The material is luscious, truly. The sizing is slightly generous. The color is as shown. As with most knitted sweaters, if you stretch it - light will come through. I consider this a delicate top that should be worn loose and generously. I'm happy to have ordered it but even happier to wear it. I'm 5'10 and 130 lbs. so I ordered the extra large (XL). When I put it on my first reaction was, "Lordy, I'm never taking this off!". My next thought was "Jeepers, I need to order another one!". The fit was really ideal. It's a "whisper" of a sweater (if you know what I mean). I hope this helps your decision. I just can't find any drawbacks. Pax.

From the original photo I expected this top to be more “knitted-sweater” like. But the material is actually rather light weight, but oh-so-comfy! I am planning to add a couple of other colors soon.
